main event: An unidentified object was observed for 30 minutes in Miami, Florida on January 13, 1957.
interesting points: The object appeared to be vibrating in the same spot before it disappeared and reappeared twice., The sighting took place at an angle of 15 miles at 20 degrees., The observer was a civilian who reported it as an unknown object., The officer believed it to be a star twinkling due to evening haze., The object did not make any sound during the observation.
sighted object: unknown object with red and green glare
